2.3.1 Whitespace characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
2.3.2 Special escape sequences:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='GenericWhitespace'/>
    <module name='TrailingComment'>
        <property name='format' value='.*'/>
        <property name='legalComment' value='.*'/>
    </module>"
}
2.3.3 Non-ASCII characters:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
3.3.1 No wildcard imports:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='AvoidStarImport'>
        <property name='allowClassImports' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowStaticMemberImports' value='false'/>
    </module>
    <module name='AvoidStaticImport'/>
    <module name='RedundantImport'/>
    <module name='ImportOrder'>
        <property name='caseSensitive' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
3.3.3 Ordering and spacing:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='ImportOrder'>
        <property name='caseSensitive' value='true'/>
        <property name='groups' value='java.,javax.,*'/>
        <property name='option' value='ordered'/>
        <property name='ordered' value='true'/>
        <property name='separated' value='true'/>
        <property name='sortStaticImportsAlphabetically' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
4 Formatting:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='arrayInitIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='0'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='0'/>
        <property name='forceStrictCondition' value='false'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='4'/>
    </module>"
}
4.1.1 Use of optional braces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='NeedBraces'>
        <property name='allowEmptyLoopBody' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowSingleLineStatement' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_WHILE'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RightCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_DEFAULT, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_DO'/>
    </module>"
}

{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":

        <property name='allowSingleLineStatement' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_THROW, LITERAL_BREAK, LITERAL_CONTINUE, LITERAL_ASSERT, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_DEFAULT, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_THROW, LITERAL_BREAK, LITERAL_CONTINUE, LITERAL_ASSERT'/>
    </module>

        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_THROW, LITERAL_BREAK, LITERAL_CONTINUE, LITERAL_ASSERT'/>
    </module>"
}

{
    "Answer":  "Yes",

        <property name='arrayInitIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='2'/>

        <property name='caseIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='forceStrictCondition' value='false'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='2'/>

    </module>"
}
4.5 Line-wrapping:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":

        <property name='arrayInitIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='4'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='4'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='arrayInitIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='4'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='4'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='space'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='METHOD_DEF,CTOR_DEF,METHOD_CALL,CTOR_CALL'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.2 Indent continuation lines at least:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='arrayInitIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='4'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='4'/>

}
4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='SingleSpaceSeparator'>
        <property name='validateComments' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='NoWhitespaceBefore'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='tokens_to_check'/>
    </module>
    <module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='arrayInitIndent' value='value'/>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='value'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='value'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='value'/>
        <property name='forceStrictCondition' value='true'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='value'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='value'/>
    </module>"
}
4.7 Grouping parentheses: recommended:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='UnnecessaryParentheses'>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, BAND, BOR, BXOR, COLON, DIV, EQUAL, GE, GT, LAND, LE, LITERAL_INSTANCEOF, LOR, LT, MINUS, MOD, NOT_EQUAL, PLUS, QUESTION, SL, SR, STAR'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.4 Switch statements:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidNestedBlocks'>
        <property name='allowInSwitchCase' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MissingSwitchDefault'/>
    <module name='NoWhitespaceBeforeCaseDefaultColon'/>
    <module name='EmptyBlock'/>
    <module name='OneStatementPerLine'/>
    <module name='NeedBraces'/>
    <module name='InnerAssignment'/>
    <module name='RightCurly'/>
    <module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='arrayInitIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='0'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='forceStrictCondition' value='false'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='4'/>
    </module>
    <module name='AvoidInlineConditionals'/>"
}
4.8.6 Comments:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='JavadocMissingWhitespaceAfterAsterisk'>
        <property name='violateExecutionOnNonTightHtml' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='TrailingComment'>
        <property name='format' value='.*'/>
        <property name='legalComment' value='.*'/>
    </module>"
}
5.1 Rules common to all identifiers:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='AbbreviationAsWordInName'>
        <property name='allowedAbbreviationLength' value='0'/>
        <property name='ignoreFinal' value='false'/>
        <property name='ignoreStatic' value='false'/>
        <property name='ignoreStaticFinal' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.3 Method names:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='MethodName'>
        <property name='allowClassName' value='false'/>
        <property name='applyToPackage' value='true'/>
        <property name='applyToPrivate' value='true'/>
        <property name='applyToProtected' value='true'/>
        <property name='applyToPublic' value='true'/>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z]+[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
    </module>"
}
6.3 Static members: qualified using clas:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AvoidStaticImport'>
        <property name='excludes' value='java.lang.Math.*'/>
    </module>
    <module name='HideUtilityClassConstructor'/>
    <module name='StaticVariableName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
    </module>"
}
7.1.2 Paragraphs:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",

        <property name='allowNewlineParagraph' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RequireEmptyLineBeforeBlockTagGroup'/>
    <module name='JavadocBlockTagLocation'/>
    <module name='JavadocMissingWhitespaceAfterAsterisk'/>
    <module name='JavadocMissingLeadingAsterisk'/>
    <module name='JavadocContentLocation'>
        <property name='location' value='first_line'/>
    </module>"
}
7.1.3 Block tags:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='AtclauseOrder'>
        <property name='tagOrder' value='@param, @return, @throws, @deprecated'/>
        <property name='target' value='METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
7.2 The summary fragment:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":

        <property name='forbiddenSummaryFragments' value='\\{@code|\\{@inheritDoc|\\{@return'/>
        <property name='period' value='.'/>
    </module>
    <module name='JavadocStyle'>
        <property name='checkFirstSentence' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
7.3 Where Javadoc is used:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": "<module name='MissingJavadocType'>
        <property name='scope' value='PUBLIC'/>
    </module>
    <module name='JavadocVariable'/>
    <module name='JavadocStyle'>
        <property name='checkEmptyJavadoc' value='true'/>
        <property name='checkFirstSentence' value='true'/>
        <property name='checkHtml' value='true'/>
        <property name='endOfSentenceFormat' value='[.!?][ \t\n\x0B\f\r]*'/>
        <property name='scope' value='PUBLIC'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='METHOD_DEF,CTOR_DEF,VAR_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
